FuncDef:
The evpl instance command binds an EVPL instance to an interface.
The undo evpl instance command unbinds an EVPL instance from an interface.
By default, no EVPL instance is bound to an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an EVPL instance ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 256000.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
EVPL provides a P2P packets transmitting service solution. Regarding this solution, an MPLS or VXLAN tunnel is established to traverse the backbone network. This solution provides a simple Layer 2 packet forwarding mode for the connection between AC interfaces at both ends, avoiding the need to search MAC address entries. This command binds an EVPL instance to an AC interface.
